meanings.definition: Meoued (verb): past tense of meoue, to make a soft, high-pitched sound like a cat
meanings.sent1: The kitten meoued softly when it wanted attention.
meanings.sent2: Last night, the stray cat meoued outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The meoued cat seemed to be singing a lullaby to the moon.
meanings.sent4: Her voice meoued through the room, calming everyone down.
meanings.sent5: The meoued melody of the cat echoed in the empty alleyway.

meanings.definition: Meoued (adjective): having made a soft, high-pitched sound like a cat
meanings.sent1: The meoued kitten was finally found by its owner.
meanings.sent2: The meoued sound filled the room with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent3: The meoued cat toy was a favorite among the children.
meanings.sent4: Her meoued laughter was contagious, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent5: The meoued purring of the cat soothed the anxious child.
